function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential bias in research focus and coverage due to the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Loss of coverage of marginalized concerns and exacerbation of existing bias","Mitigation":"Recognition of likely biases and prioritization of research on marginalized research areas","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Researchers, marginalized communities","Owner":"Researchers, funders"},{"Description":"Exacerbation of existing bias in social research in energy associated with the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Clouded future accounts and understandings of the true effects of the pandemic on energy research","Mitigation":"Informed choice-making and prioritization of research coverage to match real-world problems","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Epistemic community, funders","Owner":"Epistemic community, funders"},{"Description":"Loss of validity in social research in energy associated with the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Decreased confidence in the findings and recommendations presented by researchers","Mitigation":"Collecting and reporting additional contextual data, reviewing research design elements to ensure robustness to pandemic-related impacts","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Researchers, users of research findings","Owner":"Researchers"}]}
